<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Upgrade Script - August (PSD Dictionary)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var docArr = [
    {
        'query': 'elementISEMPTY^name=sn_spend_psd_procurement_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Procurement Case',
            'plural': 'Procurement Cases'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'elementISEMPTY^name=sn_spend_psd_procurement_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Procurement Case Line',
            'plural': 'Procurement Case Lines'
        }
    },
];

docArr.forEach(updateDocumentation);

function updateDocumentation(docObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(docObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, docObj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-06-11 05:12:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c3e62ae7c3203010b12ad0f73c40ddf6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Upgrade Script - August (PSD Dictionary)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">825ca2835303101077b6ddeeff7b12d8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">825ca2835303101077b6ddeeff7b12d8</sys_scope>

        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
